nodes.text: Tirsa was an industrial planet located within the Tirsa system of the Outer Rim Territories. It was home to the Tirsa Wargear armaments company that manufactured the Leviathan submersible carrier.

During the Galactic War, the local wildlife of Tirsa evolved to rely on the local spice deposits. Their unique biology was examined and the blood samples taken from the animals revealed that the spice had bonded with their blood cells.
